scenario_1.persona_desc: A tech-savvy individual who is always on the lookout for new ways to communicate and stay connected with friends and colleagues. They are familiar with various chat and instant messaging platforms and are interested in exploring new tools and services to enhance their communication experience. They appreciate the convenience and speed of instant messaging and are open to using it for both quick and longer conversations.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is the right option. Even though the other person gets more, I still get $400.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, regardless of what the other person gets. Therefore, I choose the Left option.
